original: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai anuruddho sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho āyasmato anuruddhassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “yesaṁ kesañci cattāro satipaṭṭhānā viraddhā, viraddho tesaṁ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī.
analyzed: yesam kesañci cattāro sati paṭṭhānāḥ viraddhāḥ viraddhaḥ tesam ariyaḥ maggo sammā dukkha kkhaya gāmī

original: Yesaṁ kesañci cattāro satipaṭṭhānā āraddhā, āraddho tesaṁ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī”ti.
analyzed: yesam kesañci cattāro sati paṭṭhānāḥ āraddhāḥ āraddho tesam ariyaḥ maggo sammā dukkha kkhaya gāmī ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmato anuruddhassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa cetasā cetaḥ upari vitakkam aññāyaseyyathā api

original: nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya;
analyzed: nāma balavā purisaḥ samiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya
evam eva āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa sammukhe pātuḥ ahosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso anuruddha, bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānā āraddhā hontī”ti?
analyzed: kittāvatā nu kho āvuso anuruddha bhikkhuno cattāro satipaṭṭhānāḥ āraddhāḥ honti iti

original: “Idhāvuso, bhikkhu ajjhattaṁ kāye samudayadhammānupassī viharati, ajjhattaṁ kāye
analyzed: idha āvuso bhikkhu ajjhattam kāye samudaya dhamma anupassī viharati ajjhattam kāye

original: vayadhammānupassī viharati, ajjhattaṁ kāye samudayavayadhammānupassī viharati ātāpī
analyzed: vaya dhamma anupassī viharati ajjhattam kāye samudaya vaya dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī

original: Bahiddhā kāye samudayadhammānupassī viharati, bahiddhā kāye vayadhammānupassī viharati,
analyzed: bahiddhā kāye samudaya dhamma anupassī viharati bahiddhā kāye vaya dhamma anupassī viharati

original: bahiddhā kāye samudayavayadhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya
analyzed: bahiddhā kāye samudaya vaya dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya

original: Ajjhattabahiddhā kāye samudayadhammānupassī viharati, ajjhattabahiddhā kāye vayadhammānupassī
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddhā kāye samudaya dhamma anupassī viharati ajjhatta bahiddhā kāye vaya dhamma anupassī

original: viharati, ajjhattabahiddhā kāye samudayavayadhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno
analyzed: viharati ajjhatta bahiddhā kāye samudaya vaya dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno

original: So sace ākaṅkhati: ‘appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati;

original: sace ākaṅkhati: ‘paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati;

original: sace ākaṅkhati: ‘paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati;

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṁ viharati sutanutīre.

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā anuruddhena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena āyasmā anuruddho tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā anuruddhena saddhim sammodisu

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam anuruddham etat avocuḥ

original: “katamesaṁ āyasmā anuruddho dhammānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti?
analyzed: katamesam āyasmai anuruddho dhammānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiññatam pattoti

original: “Catunnaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto.
analyzed: catunnam khvāha āvuso sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiññatam patto

original: Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
analyzed: idha aha āvuso kāye kāya anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: imesaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto.
analyzed: imesam khvāha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiñña tam patto

original: dhammaṁ hīnato abbhaññāsiṁ, majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ majjhimato abbhaññāsiṁ, paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

analyzed: idha āvuso bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: asekhenāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā upasampajja vihātabbā”ti.
analyzed: asekhena āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā ime cattāro sati paṭṭhānā upasampajja vihātabbā ati

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “katamesaṁ āyasmā anuruddho dhammānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti?
analyzed: katamesam āyasmai anuruddho dhammānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiññatam pattoti

original: “Catunnaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto.
analyzed: catunnam khvāha āvuso sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiññatam patto

original: Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
analyzed: idha aha āvuso kāye kāya anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: imesaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto.
analyzed: imesam khvāha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiñña tam patto

original: Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā sahassaṁ lokaṁ abhijānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā sahassam lokam abhijānāmi iti

original: Tatra kho āyasmā anuruddho bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho āyasman anuruddhaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato anuruddhassa paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa

original: “Cattārome, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhākkhayāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: cattāro me āvuso sati paṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhā kkhayāya savattanti
idha āvuso bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharati pe

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: ime kho, āvuso, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhākkhayāya saṁvattantī”ti.
analyzed: ime kho āvuso cattāro sati paṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā taṇhā kkhayāya savattanti iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṁ viharati salaḷāgāre.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai anuruddhaḥ sāvatthiyam viharati salaḷāgāre

original: Tatra kho āyasmā anuruddho bhikkhū āmantesi …pe… etadavoca:
analyzed: tatra kho āyasman anuruddhaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi pe etat avoca

original: “seyyathāpi, āvuso, gaṅgā nadī pācīnaninnā pācīnapoṇā pācīnapabbhārā.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api āvuso gaṅgā nadī pācīna ninnā pācīna poṇā pācīna pabbhārā
atha mahā jana kāyaḥ āgaccheyya kudāla piṭakam ādāya

original: ‘mayaṁ imaṁ gaṅgānadiṁ pacchāninnaṁ karissāma pacchāpoṇaṁ pacchāpabbhāran’ti.
analyzed: mayam imam gaṅgānadim pacchāninnam karissāma pacchā poṇam pacchā pabbhāranti

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññathāvuso, api nu so mahājanakāyo gaṅgānadiṁ pacchāninnaṁ kareyya pacchāpoṇaṁ pacchāpabbhāran”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññatha avuso api nu saḥ mahā jana kāyaḥ gaṅgānadim pacchāninnam kareyya pacchā poṇam pacchā pabbhāranti
gaṅgā āvuso nadī pācīna ninnā pācīna poṇā pācīna pabbhārā

original: Sā na sukarā pacchāninnaṁ kātuṁ pacchāpoṇaṁ pacchāpabbhāraṁ.
analyzed: sā na sukarā pacchā a ninnam kātum pacchā a poṇam pacchā pabbhāra

original: Yāvadeva ca pana so mahājanakāyo kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
analyzed: yāvat eva ca pana saḥ mahā jana kāyaḥ kilamathassa vighātassa bhāgī assa ati

original: “Evameva kho, āvuso, bhikkhuṁ cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventaṁ cattāro satipaṭṭhāne
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso bhikkhum cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne bhāventam cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne

original: bahulīkarontaṁ rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā
analyzed: bahulīkarontam rājānaḥ vā rāja mahāmattāḥ vā mittāḥ vā amaccāḥ vā ñātī vā sālohitāḥ vā

original: ‘ehambho purisa, kiṁ te ime kāsāvā anudahanti?
analyzed: eham bho purisa kim te ime kāsāvāḥ anudahanti

original: Ehi hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjassu puññāni ca karohī’ti.
analyzed: ehi hīnāya avattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjassu puññāni ca karohi iti

original: So vata, āvuso, bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvento cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkaronto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata āvuso bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvento cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkaronto sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, cittaṁ dīgharattaṁ vivekaninnaṁ vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāraṁ taṁ vata hīnāyāvattissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: yat hi te āvuso cittam dīgharattam viveka ninnam viveka poṇam viveka pabbhāram tam vata hīnāya avattissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Kathañcāvuso, bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveti, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkarotīti?
analyzed: kathañca āvuso bhikkhu cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne bhāveti cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkaroti iti
idha āvuso bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharati pe

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Evaṁ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāveti, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkarotī”ti.
analyzed: evam kho āvuso bhikkhu cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne bhāveti cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne bahulīkaroti iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca sāriputto vesāliyaṁ viharanti ambapālivane.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā ca anuruddhaḥ āyasmā ca sāriputto vesāliyam viharanti ambapāli vane

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ pe ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “Vippasannāni kho te, āvuso anuruddha, indriyāni, parisuddho mukhavaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: vippasannāni kho te āvuso anuruddhe indriyāni parisuddhaḥ mukha vaṇṇaḥ pariyodātaḥ

original: Katamenāyasmā anuruddho vihārena etarahi bahulaṁ viharatī”ti?
analyzed: katamena ayasmai anuruddhaḥ vihārena etarahi bahulam viharati iti

original: “Catūsu khvāhaṁ, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto etarahi bahulaṁ viharāmi.
analyzed: catūsu khvā aha āvuso sati paṭṭhānesu su patiṭṭhita cittaḥ etarahi bahulam viharāmi

original: Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ;
analyzed: idha aha āvuso kāye kāya anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: imesu khvāhaṁ, āvuso, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto etarahi bahulaṁ viharāmi.
analyzed: imesu khvā aha āvuso catūsu sati paṭṭhānesu su patiṭṭhita cittaḥ etarahi bahulam viharāmi

original: Yo so, āvuso, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ āvuso bhikkhu araham khīṇa āsavaḥ vusitavā kata karaṇīyaḥ ohita bhāraḥ anuppatta sadattho

original: parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto, so imesu catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto
analyzed: parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanaḥ sammadaññā vimutto so imesu catūsu sati paṭṭhānesu su patiṭṭhita citto

original: “Lābhā vata no, āvuso, suladdhaṁ vata no, āvuso.
analyzed: lābhāḥ vata naḥ āvuso su laddham vata naḥ āvuso

original: Ye mayaṁ āyasmato anuruddhassa sammukhāva assumha āsabhiṁ vācaṁ bhāsamānassā”ti.
analyzed: ye mayam āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa sammukhāḥ ava assumha āsabhim vācam bhāsamānassa ati

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṁ viharati andhavanasmiṁ ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai anuruddhaḥ sāvatthiyam viharati andhavanasmiṃ ābādhikaḥ dukkhitaḥ bāḷha gilānaḥ

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena āyasman anuruddhaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam anuruddham etat avocuḥ

original: “Katamenāyasmato anuruddhassa vihārena viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti?
analyzed: katamena āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa vihārena viharataḥ uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittam na pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti iti

original: “Catūsu kho me, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
analyzed: catūsu kho me āvuso sati paṭṭhānesu su patiṭṭhita cittassa viharataḥ uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittam na pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti
idha aha āvuso kāye kāya anupassī viharāmi pe

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: imesu kho me, āvuso, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti.
analyzed: imesu kho me āvuso catūsu sati paṭṭhānesu su patiṭṭhita cittassa viharataḥ uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittam na pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai anuruddho sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā anuruddhena saddhiṁ …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena āyasman anuruddhaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā anuruddhena saddhim pe ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam anuruddham etat avocuḥ

original: “Katamesaṁ āyasmā anuruddho dhammānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti?
analyzed: katamesam āyasmai anuruddho dhammānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiññatam pattoti

original: “Catunnaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto.
analyzed: catunnam khvāha āvuso sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiññatam patto
idha aha āvuso kāye kāya anupassī viharāmi pe

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ—
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: imesaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṁ patto.
analyzed: imesam khvāha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā mahā abhiñña tam patto

original: Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā kappasahassaṁ anussarāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā kappa sahassam anussarāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā anekavihitaṁ
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā aneka vihita

original: iddhividhaṁ paccanubhomi—ekopi hutvā bahudhā homi …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattemī”ti.
analyzed: iddhi vidham paccanubhomi ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā homi pe yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vattemi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā dibbāya
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā dibbāya

original: sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāmi dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā”ti.
analyzed: sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkanta mānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāmi dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca ati

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi—
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā para sattānam para puggalānam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi
sa rāgam vā cittam sa rāgam cittam iti pajānāmi pe
a vimuttam vā cittam a vimuttam cittam iti pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā ṭhānam ca ṭhānataḥ a ṭhānataḥ a ṭhānataḥ yathābhūtam pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ kammasamādānānaṁ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā atīta anāgata paccuppannānam kamma samādānānam ṭhānasaḥ hetusaḥ vipākam yathābhūtam pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā sabbatthagāminippaṭipadaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā sabbatthagāmi nippaṭipadam yathābhūtam pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā anekadhātunānādhātulokaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita tā bahulīkata tā aneka dhātu nānā dhātu lokam yathābhūtam pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā sattānaṁ nānādhimuttikataṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā sattānam nānā adhimuttikatam yathābhūtam pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ indriyaparopariyattaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā para sattānam para puggalānam indriya paropariyattam yathābhūtam pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ saṅkilesaṁ vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā jhāna vimokkha samādhi samāpattīnam saṅkilesam vodānam vuṭṭhānam yathābhūtam pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā anekavihitaṁ
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā aneka vihita

original: pubbenivāsaṁ anussarāmi, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ
analyzed: pubbenivāsam anussarāmi sa eyyathida ekam pi jātim dve pi jātiyaḥ pe iti sa ākāram sa uddesa

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā dibbena
analyzed: imesam ca pana āha āvuso catunnam satipaṭṭhānānam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā dibbena

original: cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne …pe…
analyzed: cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne pe

original: iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena yathākammūpage satte pajānāmī”ti.
analyzed: iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena yathā kamma upage satte pajānāmi iti

original: “Imesañca panāhaṁ, āvuso, catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā āsavānaṁ
analyzed: imesam ca pana aha āvuso catunnam sati paṭṭhānānam bhāvita tā bahulīkata tā āsavānaṃ

original: khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā
analyzed: khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā
